entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: One of the four houses at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. The hat screamed 'Gryffindor' when it touched Malfoy's head.

entities.name: macdougall morag
entities.description: A person who was given the GRYFFINDOR hat by Neville. Mentioned as receiving the hat from Neville.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. The hat screamed 'Slytherin' when it touched his head.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: One of Malfoy's friends. Mentioned as being with Goyle.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: One of Malfoy's friends. Mentioned as being with Crabbe.

entities.name: moon
entities.description: A person whose name was called by the hat. Mentioned along with Nott and Parkinson.

entities.name: nott
entities.description: A person whose name was called by the hat. Mentioned along with Moon and Parkinson.

entities.name: parkinson
entities.description: A person whose name was called by the hat. Mentioned along with Moon and Nott.

entities.name: patil
entities.description: Twin girls whose names were called by the hat.

entities.name: perks sally-anne
entities.description: A person whose name was called by the hat. Mentioned as being one of the last people to be sorted.

entities.name: potter harry
entities.description: The main character in the story. The hat screamed 'Gryffindor' when it touched his head.

relationships.description: The hat screamed 'Slytherin' when it touched Malfoy's head, indicating that he was assigned to Slytherin house.
MacDougall Morag received the GRYFFINDOR hat from Neville.
The hat screamed 'Gryffindor' when it touched Harry's head, indicating that he was assigned to Gryffindor house.
